properties.title: Vaduz Citytrain
properties.abstract: Enjoy the capital city of Vaduz and its surroundings on a leisurely journey with the Vaduz city train.
properties.description: On your trip with the Citytrain you can not only experience Vaduz and all of its charm, but also discover the most important aspects of the country and its dynasty, history and the modern day. Get on board and discover Vaduz as it truly is – modern and historic, banks and farmyards, independent and baronial. A visit to Liechtenstein’s residence with the city train is recommended.
properties.name: Citytrain AG
